page.title: 05Industry in Halewood.
page.content: There are just two factories within our area. These factories are Ward Blenkinsops and Fords. Ward Blenkinsops is a chemical factory producing pharmecutical products,fungicides and other fine chemicals. It is located in open countryside away from centres of population. Established in 1939 it now makes over one hundred products, many of these being exported all over the world. The Ford factory produces motor vehicles. The plant was opened in 1962 and now employs over 10,000 people. The vehicles produced include the Escort and the Orion. More than four million vehicles have been made in the Halewood factory since it was opened.
